title: Woman strips down to her underwear in Middle Road in Singapore after argument with taxi driver
text:
A woman who stripped off her clothes in the middle of a street after a bizzare argument with a taxi driver has been arrested.

Shocking footage shows the 31-year-old chasing and yelling out to the taxi driver around 2am on Middle Road in Singapore.

At one point the woman striking the man as she continues chasing him and repeatedly grabbing the straps of her black dress.

Shocking footage shows the 31-year-old chasing and yelling out to the taxi driver around 2am on Middle Road in Singapore

As the taxi driver runs away, the woman then strips down to her underwear and bra and kicks her dress onto the road, while cars are driving around her.

She then proceeds to take off her underwear before a brave man approaches her and pulls them back up for her.

The random man then picks up the woman's dress and hands it to her, and points in the other direction.

He also puts his hands out to stop her from walking toward the taxi driver.

The embarrassed woman walks away with her head bowed down and puts her dress back on.

Footage then cuts to the taxi driver who is laughing as he shows off the injuries he sustained from the woman.

Lawrence recorded the incident and posted the footage to Facebook on Thursday and it has already raked 146,000 views.

'He didn't lay any hands on her … I decided to record it, in case he needs help with evidence,' he wrote in the caption.

'I only ended up capturing this part. At least this video shows that the lady undressed herself.'

It is unsure what the woman was upset or angry about and whether or not she was intoxicated or mentally ill.
